channel.title: Changing how high an npc can hit
channel.description:
All my monsters on the server always hit the same 1-4
I want my monsters to hit higher (just certain ones)
I saw a tutorial for this a while back, i skimmed the tutorial list and nothing.
If you have the answer for my question please post it.

item.title: Changing how high an npc can hit
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.source: Changing how high an npc can hit

item.title: Changing how high an npc can hit
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Change itâ€™s combat level In npc.cfg, or you can Manually change it in the attackPlayer method in your NPCHandler.
